format.description: a short version of the Accept header, e.g. json, yaml

delimiter.description: The character to use between values within a CSV row. Only valid for the csv format.

drop_null_columns.description: Should entirely null columns be removed from the results? Their name and type will be returning in a new `all_columns` section.

body.description: Use the `query` element to start a query. Use `columnar` to format the answer.
